import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "./AddNewBook.scss" import axios from 'axios' const AddNewBook = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ title: "", description: "", price: 0, count: 0, category: "", imgURL: "" }) function handleChange(event) { setFormData(values => ({ ...values, [event.target.name]: event.target.value })) } function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() axios.post("http://localhost:5000/item/addbook", { formData }) .then((res) => console.log(res)) .catch((err) => console.log(err)) } return

Add a new book

; }; export default AddNewBook;
